details.message:
`001.008.006 Mk_Workstages_Mater`
- Test assigns units of material "M@T-1" to workstages. 
- 10 units to "Stage A".
- 20 units to "Stage B".
- 30 units to "Stage C".
- To create inventory, see `005.001.001`.
details.name: 001.008.006 Mk_Workstages_Mater
